text: @BetteMidler @FoxNews I truly feel sorry for Americans. Trump and his cabinet are the ugliness of a society that is lead by prejudice, greed, dishonesty and narcissism. So many are suffering at their hands. Stay safe. Truly in my prayers for all to  overcome Covid19 and Trumps rule. ❤🙏🌷
